paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a pathogenic variant in the KCNH2 gene associated with congenital long QT syndrome.

individual_records.phenotype_details: extremely prolonged QTc to 653, functional 2:1 heart block, frequent ectopy, and intermittent ventricular tachycardia
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Arrhythmia gene panel confirmed the final diagnosis of pathogenic variant identified in KCNH2 gene p.Gly628Ser (c.1882G>A) associated with autosomal dominant LQTS type 2.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with congenital long QT syndrome type 2.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with the disease in the patient.
variants.additional_notes: No additional functional assays or population frequency data were provided.
key_quotes: Arrhythmia gene panel confirmed the final diagnosis of pathogenic variant identified in KCNH2 gene p.Gly628Ser (c.1882G>A) associated with autosomal dominant LQTS type 2.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear identification of the variant in the KCNH2 gene.
